EmailTemplate.subject: Technical Demo > Trustworthy Resizing Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-policy-driven-automation/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You are invited to join Technology Evangelist Eric Wright as he demonstrates trustworthy automation with Turbonomic on June 13th at 11am ET.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-policy-driven-automation/]]>
In this 30-minute live demo session, you will learn how to setup automation policies in only a few clicks with the help of Turbonomic.
See you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
